description:
Hayabusa Shou is a delinquent in 2nd grade who is regarded as a model by other delinquents. He is handsome and smart, and, unlike most delinquents, he respects honor. He managed to drag http://anidb.net/ch79466 [Sakamoto] into a duel with him, but was finally moved by Sakamoto.
He is currently aligned to Sakamoto after long-time delinquent http://anidb.net/ch80875 [Fukase] damaged his noseline during the cultural festival. It reveals that he is the eldest brother who showed concern on his siblings and his estranged http://anidb.net/ch83564 [father].
Hayabusa was the last person that Sakamoto met before he left for America and the former suspected his reason of departure as a lie despite Sakamoto denied it as such.
Source: Wikipedia
name: 8823-senpai
